english.segment1: I believe that in the beginningYou spoke into the darkness and created lightI believe that You started historyWith a few words You created everything goodI believe that You saved Your peopleWhen pharaoh's army was a comin' after themI believe You parted the sea andWith a might hand, led Your people to the promised landYou are strongYOU CAN DO ANYTHING, ANHYTHINGYOUR WORD IS TRUE, EVERY PROMISE YEAHALMIGHTY GOD WITH OUR HEARTS WE BELIEVEYOU CAN DO ANYTHING, ANYTHING, ANYTHINGI believe You came down from HeavenYou walked on water and You caused the blind to seeI believe, Jesus, that You died for sin, rose againAnd You're coming back to win. You are God.We're coming back to You with faith likeChildren on our knees againYou've spoken and You've promised You areFaithful You will never changeWe've heard of Your fame, stand in awe ofDeeds You've done in ages pastRenew them in our day Lord, have Your wayLord, let Your Kingdom comeSalvation spring up from the groundLet blind eyes see let the lost be foundYour praises lifted higher, higherSpirit set this world on fireCome break the bonds of Satan on this nationLord we believeThat nothing is impossible for You.
